name: Hungriwi
description:
Help Elly to eat !

Elly a little kiwi who lives alone on his island is blessed by the goddess of the Moon who allows him to go back in time when he eats

You must help him eat as much as possible before dawn by moving him with ZQSD, the directional arrows or the stick of a gamepad

Credits : Game Design & Programming :
  • Sky,  Fr0oZz Fred, Nibofar

Graphisms :

  • Fr0oZz Fred, ccadori, Plumedessine, craftPix

Sounds :
